00011 #include "iarcompat.h"
00012 #ifndef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00013 #   include <avr/io.h>
00014 #endif
00015 #include "oddebug.h"
00016 
00017 #if DEBUG_LEVEL > 0
00018 
00019 #warning "Debugging is turned on! Never compile production devices with debugging!"
00020 
00021 static void uartPutc(char c)
00022 {
00023     while(!(ODDBG_USR & (1 << ODDBG_UDRE)));    /* wait for data register empty */
00024     ODDBG_UDR = c;
00025 }
00026 
00027 static uchar    hexAscii(uchar h)
00028 {
00029     h &= 0xf;
00030     if(h >= 10)
00031         h += 'a' - (uchar)10 - '0';
00032     h += '0';
00033     return h;
00034 }
00035 
00036 static void printHex(uchar c)
00037 {
00038     uartPutc(hexAscii(c >> 4));
00039     uartPutc(hexAscii(c));
00040 }
00041 
00042 void    odDebug(uchar prefix, uchar *data, uchar len)
00043 {
00044     printHex(prefix);
00045     uartPutc(':');
00046     while(len--){
00047         uartPutc(' ');
00048         printHex(*data++);
00049     }
00050     uartPutc('\r');
00051     uartPutc('\n');
00052 }
00053 
00054 #endif
